channel.title: Rosa Hybridaa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Rosa Hybridaa on funPlantGenes

item.title: Rh-PIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Rh-PIP2|1 Gene Name: plasma membrane aquaporin Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: Rh-PIP2|1|Rh-PIP2|1, a Rose Aquaporin Gene, Is Involved in Ethylene-Regulated Petal Expansion.

item.title: RhERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF1 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: Rosa hybridaaa RhERF1 and RhERF4 mediate ethylene- and auxin-regulated petal abscission by influencing pectin degradation.

item.title: RhERF113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF113 Gene Name: cultivar cultivar Samantha ERF113 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: RhERF113 Functions in Ethylene-Induced Petal Senescence by Modulating Cytokinin Content in Rose.

item.title: RhERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF4 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 4 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: Rosa hybridaaa RhERF1 and RhERF4 mediate ethylene- and auxin-regulated petal abscission by influencing pectin degradation.
